EmailTemplate.description: Email to BIA staff with Holiday Infographic
EmailTemplate.name: DMS Holiday 2017
EmailTemplate.subject: Digital Main Street - Holiday Checklist
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
With the holidays fast approaching, the DMS team wanted to share a small holiday survival checklist we put together for your businesses with some quick tips and tricks they can look to implement to make the holiday season a success!
https://www.dropbox.com/s/rexn4tnzxtbmijx/DMS%20Holiday%20Graphic%20%2829Nov17%29.pdf?dl=0
Feel free to share with your members or include in any communications going out!
Cheers!
-Darryl
